title: With Karla Sears: Dialogue, Classical Education, and Mixed Feelings about the Industrial Revolution
description: Karla has been paying avid attention to conversations in our little corner of the internet. An enthusiastic proponent of the  classical method of teaching, she homeschools her sons while reclaiming her own education.
